definition: space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]

sentences.english: These arenormally sedate affairs where empty chairs outnumber the audience.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，空椅子比听众多是读书会上很平常的事。

sentences.english: Do not pressurize or expose to open flame or heat.
sentences.chinese: 不要给空容器加压，不要放在明火或热源附近。

sentences.english: The decanter and the glass were completely empty.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃瓶和玻璃杯都已完全空了。

sentences.english: Well, you're not coming empty-handed, are you?
sentences.chinese: 天啊，你总不会空着手来，是吧。

sentences.english: A vacancy has arisen which I intend to fill.
sentences.chinese: 有一个职位空了出来，我想要补上。

sentences.english: The house was empty and shuttered.
sentences.chinese: 这所房子是空的，窗板都关上了。

sentences.english: Showing color and sky is do not hinder and identical.
sentences.chinese: 说明了色和空是不相碍而相同的。

sentences.english: Status Offline Why See the Glass Half Empty?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要把杯子看成是半杯空的呢？

sentences.english: When an object pops up, the mirror will reflect it and when it disappears, there will be nothing in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 应该像佛菩萨的大圆镜智，物来则显，物去则空。

sentences.english: What he said does not matter.
sentences.chinese: 他所讲的空无什么关系。

sentences.english: Secure all work with clamps or a vise, freeing both hands to operate tools.
sentences.chinese: 使用夹钳或虎钳固定工件，以便空出双手来操作工具。

sentences.english: Laughing Chujiang empty at all, can not be washed naoomi injustice.
sentences.chinese: 堪笑楚江空渺渺，不能洗得直臣冤。

sentences.english: The hammer and sickle was flying over the roof.
sentences.chinese: 镰刀斧头旗在屋顶上下空飘扬。

sentences.english: If it is empty, we return an empty array.
sentences.chinese: 如果它为空，将返回一个空数组。

sentences.english: If it is empty, we return an empty array.
sentences.chinese: 如果它为空，将返回一个空数组。

sentences.english: When the buffer is empty, the transport layer is responsible for refilling it.
sentences.chinese: 当缓冲空了，传送层负责再装满它。
